dev/lsf/asio/async/read_data_buffer.hpp

00001 // File:        read_data_buffer.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2015-07-28 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <unordered_map>
00009 #include "lsf/basic/singleton.hpp"
00010 
00011 namespace lsf {
00012 namespace asio {
00013 namespace async {
00014 
00015 class ReadDataBuffer : public lsf::basic::Singleton<ReadDataBuffer> {
00016 public:
00017     using data_map_type = std::unordered_map<int,std::string>;
00018 
00019 public:
00020     void AppendUnusedData(int sockfd, std::string const& data) {
00021         _data_map[sockfd].append(data);
00022     }
00023 
00024     void AppendUnusedData(int sockfd, char const* data, size_t len) {
00025         _data_map[sockfd].append(data, len);
00026     }
00027 
00028     void CheckUnusedData(int sockfd, std::string& data) {
00029         // check exist
00030         auto iter = _data_map.find(sockfd);
00031         if (iter == _data_map.end()) return;
00032 
00033         // assign
00034         data.insert(0, iter->second);
00035 
00036         // clear
00037         _data_map.erase(iter);
00038     }
00039 
00040     void ClearUnusedData(int sockfd) {
00041         _data_map.erase(sockfd);
00042     }
00043 
00044 private:
00045     data_map_type _data_map;
00046 };
00047 
00048 } // end namespace async
00049 } // end namespace asio
00050 } // end namespace lsf
00051
